attributes.action: Allow without pblm.ThisAmerican/English Woman to Live in Eng.her family's ancesteral Home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Im American born on America's East Coast. I grew up knowing my fathers family of English heritage. I want to become an English citizen.
I need with all respect to the Prime Minister to allow me without redtape & without hinderance, to enter England
and live out my life. There are others with my rare last name that do live in the UK and whom are related in some way to my fathers side.Im American and quite proud of my English past. Please help me PrimeMinister. England please sign my emotional petition. Good day.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
